Inspiration Notebook

Due: Ongoing
Worth: 10% of total grade

You will collect a set of four websites to serve as design inpirations for your work. For each website, I have prepared a series of prompts to help you reflect on and learn from the site's design. (Read more...)

Class Exercises and Quizzes

Due: Ongoing
Worth: 10% of total grade

During our class meetings, you will need to complete some short quizzes and exercises. These are designed to reinforce basic knowledge before you put that knowledge to work on larger assignments. (Read more...)

Coding Challenges

Due: Various, about once a week for the first semester
Worth: 20% of total grade

You will complete a series of short coding challenges, designed to test your understanding of our class material. Each will ask you to complete a small html/css page (or set of pages). (Read more...)

HTML/CSS Assignment

Due: October 10, 2015
Worth: 20% of total grade

You will compose a small website from scratch using html and css. The instructor will provide content for this webpage (an imaginary food truck's website), you will create an original design for the content and implement the design in HTML and CSS. (Read more...)

Bootstrap Assignment

Due: November 30, 2015
Worth: 20% of total grade

You will create a website using the bootstrap CSS/Javascript libraries. The content of the site will be your choice. You will need to build templates and layouts for the site, and incorprate twitter bootstrap in your design. (Read more...)

Final Portfolio

Due: Final exam date for your section. See SJU Final Exam Calendar for Details
Worth: 20% of total grade

You will compose a brief reflection on your work in this class. (Read more...)
